sentences.sContent: These trees come into leaf in February.
sentences.sContent_eng: These trees come into leaf in February.

sentences.sContent: It should have been all over with and forgotten by the first of last February.
sentences.sContent_eng: It should have been all over with and forgotten by the first of last February.
sentences.sCn: 它早该在去年二月的第一天就结束了，然后被人忘得无影无踪。

sentences.sContent: So let us pray together on this February morning, but let us also work together in all the days and months ahead.
sentences.sContent_eng: So let us pray together on this February morning, but let us also work together in all the days and months ahead.
sentences.sCn: 因此，在今天这个二月的早晨，让我们一起祈祷，而且也让我们在今后的岁月里一起工作。

trans.tranOther: the second month of the year, between January and March
